com.ti.debug.engine.scripting

Class ProfileActivity

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ti.debug.engine.scripting.ProfileActivity

  • public class ProfileActivity
extends java.lang.Object
    This class encapsulates the IActivity, providing users with the ability to modify the Activity object, enabling and disabling the activity and modifying the associated properties An instance of this class is automatically created when a new session is opened.

    // Create Environment and open a debug session
    ScriptingEnvironment env = new ScriptingEnvironment();
    DebugServer myServer = (DebugServer) env.getServer("DebugServer.1");
    DebugSession mySession = myServer.openSession("*", "*");

    ...

    // get a ProfileActivity object
    mySession.profileSetup.printActivityList();
    ProfileActivity myActivity = mySession.profileSetup.getActivity(activityName);

    // list the properties associated with the current activity
    myActivity.listProperties();

    // get a property from an activity list
    Property myProperty = myActivity.getProperty(propertyPath);

      Outputs the list of properties for the current activity A ScriptingException is thrown if IProperties.getItem() fails

      enable/disables an activity based on the activity name and the boolean value A ScriptingException is thrown if IActivity.enable() fails

      • getProperty

        public Property getProperty(java.lang.String path)
                     throws ScriptingException
        get a Property object from the Activity interface, based on a path String. A ScriptingException is thrown if
        Parameters:
        path - (String) is the name of the property, preceded by its parent names and separated by periods (ie; Events.CPU.access.data.read)
        Returns:
        (Property) an object encapsulating an IProperty object
        Throws:
        ScriptingException

      • getStatus

        public boolean getStatus()
        Returns the boolean value representing the activity status of an activity
        Returns:
        (boolean) true if activity is enabled, false ow.

      • listProperties

        public void listProperties()
                    throws ScriptingException
        Outputs the list of properties for the current activity A ScriptingException is thrown if IProperties.getItem() fails
        Throws:
        ScriptingException

      • setStatus

        public void setStatus(boolean value)
               throws ScriptingException
        enable/disables an activity based on the activity name and the boolean value A ScriptingException is thrown if IActivity.enable() fails
        Parameters:
        value - (boolean) enable/disable the activity
        Throws:
        ScriptingException
